dct_title_s: Rutgers University, Newark, New Jersey 1947 map 2
dct_description_sm: Hand drawn and written map of a section of Newark, New Jersey showing locations of property of Rutgers University Newark campus. Created June 1947 with revisions Sept. 21, 1956 and April 2, 1959. Street and block sizes are not in true proportion. College buildings are shaded and other landmarks including cemeteries, train stations and railroad lines are also indicated.
